snippet: Starting Wednesday, the Yankees have 27 games to make sure that a late-season swoon won’t cost them a playoff spot.
lead_paragraph: Starting Wednesday, the Yankees have 27 games to make sure that a late-season swoon won’t cost them a playoff spot.

headline.seo: With Lead All but Gone, Yankees Dwell on the Finish
headline.main: With Big Lead Gone, Yankees Dwell on Finishing
headline.print_headline: With Big Lead Gone, Yankees Dwell on Finishing
